sets.set_reasoning: The Overhead Cable Triceps Extension is chosen for its effectiveness in targeting the long head of the triceps, which is crucial for achieving the user's goal of thicker triceps. The volume of 3 sets aligns with the beginner's guideline of 3-6 sets per muscle group per session, ensuring adequate stimulus for growth.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a resistance band that allows for 10-12 reps with good form.

sets.set_reasoning: Skull Crushers are included to provide a high stretch on the long head of the triceps, complementing the overhead extensions. This exercise further ensures the user meets the weekly volume target for triceps growth.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use dumbbells that allow for 10-12 reps with good form.

sets.set_reasoning: Bar Press Down is included to target the medial and lateral heads of the triceps, providing a balanced approach to triceps development. This exercise complements the previous ones and ensures a comprehensive workout for thicker triceps.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 60-70% of your 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a resistance band that allows for 10-12 reps with good form.

workout_explanation: This workout plan is structured to meet the user's goal of thicker triceps within a 30-minute session. The exercises are ordered to target different parts of the triceps, ensuring comprehensive development. The volume and rest times are optimized for a beginner, allowing for effective muscle growth while adhering to the time constraint. The selection of exercises and their alternatives ensures that the user can progress safely and effectively, even with limited experience.
